name: Real Gun Shooter: Mobile FPS
description:
Best FPS sniper games on mobile! Gun Shooter is one of the best new shooting games of 2021.
A new action-packed game, with unlimited sniper and offline shooting missions.Become a shooting hero to show your name for all of world!

Survive.Ready. Aim. Fire!
For War of field.In real commando shooting games you will fight against terrorist attack in more levels with many missions to complete...Your duty is to kill the enemy during this commando game among the simplest online shooting games. Swipe to look around and aim at the enemies in anti-terrorist missions. keep changing the weapons for better counter attack in fps games 2021. Find weapon of choice, wait for the right moment and shoot to encounter terrorist. During cover fire reload your weapons at safe place in new shooting game. Use sniper rifle to shoot long range terrorist and stay focused to make sniper shoot. After completing the Real commando mission,you will earn extra to unlock more powerful guns: sniper & assault guns,survive till end to achieve real victory in action games.However, it is recommended for you to use all guns in all missions of this shooting game.


First-person shooters
Enjoy one of the best offline games 2021 with unlimited fun. In this new shooting games explore the best fps shooting games offline levels for real shooting fun.


Browse our most popular games
You’ll find it your favorite action games offline if you like gun games. We offer one of the top commando shooting games that will entertain you with best gaming experience.


KEY FEATURES
* Realistic 3D graphics
* Advanced enemy AI and cool animations.
* Play in multiple battlegrounds and lots of thrilling missions
* Many maps with different tactics
* Multiple Modern Weapons
* Offline game with free shooting game-play.
* Perfect optimization even for weak devices!


If you have no wifi, you can also play this offline game, absolutely free.
Download the BEST offline FPS Shooting Games and taste the real victory.
